page.title: 13Employment Opportunities
page.content: Recently new firms have opened up in the area offering{employment}to a few local people but most people we talked to had to travel to work at{Rank Xerox in{Mitcheldean,Gloucester}or work from home. We asked the parents of our schoolchildren and found that 25% of fathers worked at{Rank Xerox},25% in{ {Gloucester}and 25% at or from home.Local work was in farming, pubs, small factories or as reps.. Many of the women had to accept seasonal part-time work picking produce or else travel to{Gloucester}.Some local firms were making fitted furniture, garden ornaments and plant pots. We visited several and one firm, which undertakes welding and farm building constructions, is on a site in{ {Longhope}where the jam factory was situated.
